channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nintendo announces the pre-order date and final U.S. pricing for Switch 2
item.description: Orders had been delayed due to Trump's tariffs.

item.title: America’s nuclear talks with Iran hinge on a 68-year-old billionaire real-estate magnate
item.description: Steve Witkoff has had a close relationship with Trump for many years.

item.title: Cambodia and China Strengthen Ties as US Imposes Tariffs
item.description: China is the biggest foreign patron of Cambodia, where Mr. Xi concluded a tour of Southeast Asia. But the region also needs to curry favor with Presid...

item.title: Yemen’s Houthi rebels just suffered the single deadliest attack under Trump’s command
item.description: U.S. airstrikes killed 74 people and wounded 171 others.

item.title: Under Trump, National Security Guardrails Vanish
item.description: America’s adversaries have more room to operate, at least in the disinformation space, cybersecurity experts say.

item.title: A 30-year-old AI founder who followed the FIRE movement to build wealth is now the youngest self-made woman billionaire
item.description: Lucy Guo unseated Taylor Swift with her self-made billions.

item.title: What We Know About the FSU Shooting
item.description: Two people were killed and six others were injured when a 20-year-old gunman opened fire near the student union building, the police said.

item.title: Genesys CEO: How empathetic AI can scale our humanity during economic uncertainty
item.description: The future of AI isn’t just smart. It’s emotionally intelligent—and it’s good for business.

item.title: Rubio Says Trump to ‘Move On’ From Ukraine Peace Talks if No Progress Soon
item.description: “If it is not possible to end the war in Ukraine, we need to move on,” Secretary of State Marco Rubio said as he departed meetings in Paris.

item.title: Are Easter Baskets Getting Out of Hand?
item.description: Social media feeds are awash in images of lavish baskets overflowing with expensive gifts. Some parents are giving their children bikes. Others are pu...

item.title: Rubio Says Trump to ‘Move On’ From Ukraine Peace Talks if No Progress Soon
item.description: “If it is not possible to end the war in Ukraine, we need to move on,” Secretary of State Marco Rubio said as he departed meetings in Paris.

item.title: Syrians Recount Gas Attack Under Assad as They Seek Justice
item.description: Syria’s ousted dictator, Bashar al-Assad, unleashed a Sarin gas strike on the suburbs of Damascus in 2013, killing at least 1,500. Now, the survivors ...

item.title: Battling ‘Eat and Flee’ Tourists, Venice Brings Its Entrance Fee Back
item.description: A measure to limit day tourism on peak days began for the second year on Friday, charging day trippers five euros (or 10 for the spontaneous traveler)...

item.title: Cambodia and China Strengthen Ties as US Imposes Tariffs

item.title: G.O.P. Lawmakers in Syria Say They See Opportunity to Help Rebuild the Nation
item.description: Two Republican congressmen were expected to meet the country’s new leaders and to visit areas destroyed during the long civil war.
